name: Margonem
description:
Explore the fantastical land of Margonem!
Hundreds of maps, full of interesting ruins and unique and original towns. Your Margonem journey will never be boring!Get powerful equipment!
Each character has possibility to get legendary items. Swords, armors, jewelry, axes - all of these await mighty heroes ready to challenge formidable monsters!Dangerous adventures!
Margonem is full of challenges! Arm yourself, get prepared for a battle and challenge the best players or monsters. Unique rewards are there waiting for You! Of course, if you manage to grab them!
